excerpt: A village pastor’s crisis of faith blinds him to his failures as a priest and his cruelty toward the woman who loves him.
title: Winter Light

excerpt: An unearthed Celtic stone head spreads horrific visions wherever it goes.
title: From the Old Earth

excerpt: Caught between her cop boyfriend and his lovelorn partner, a young Triad boss becomes the target of a brutal power grab by one of her enforcers.
title: An Eye for an Eye

excerpt: A resurrected Freddy resumes his murderous ways, exploiting Alice—a teen who absorbs the dream powers of his victims—to claim more lives.
title: A Nightmare on Elm Street 4: The Dream Master

excerpt: A recovering alcoholic ex-cop turned department store Santa discovers a teenage girl is the unwilling pawn in a Neo-Nazi plot to revive the Third Reich by having her impregnated by a demonic two-foot-tall elf.
title: Elves
